message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic opportunity to get a unique item at a great price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to counteroffer at $105.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try $110 as my counteroffer. I believe this price is fair for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $115, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
